price: and those who say, “Our Lord, let our spouses and children be a source of joy for us[40], and make us good examples for the righteous.”
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعۡيُنٖ وَٱجۡعَلۡنَا لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
footnotes: [40] i.e., a source of happiness for their righteousness and adhering to a straight path.
